Entry.JapaneseText: <Cyan>七大まぼろし<White>か…… おれも探してみたくなってきたぜ。
Entry.EnglishText: The Seven Great Illusions... I kinda want to go looking for them myself.

Entry.JapaneseText: じゃあ、この旅が終ったら、 みんなで探しに出かけてみる？
Entry.EnglishText: Well, how about when this journey is over we all go out searching for them?

Entry.JapaneseText: おおっ、<Mao>最高!! いい事言うねー！
Entry.EnglishText: Ooh, <Mao>, you're the best! I like what you're putting down!

Entry.JapaneseText: ……私はパス。 あんたたち勝手にやってなさい。
Entry.EnglishText: I'll pass. You guys can do as you please.

Entry.JapaneseText: かーっ、これだからヤだね、女ってのは。 男のロマンってのをわかっちゃいないぜ。
Entry.EnglishText: Aaagh, this is what I don't like about women. They don't understand a man's love of adventure.
